mapper.select: /* 프로젝트 팀원 퇴사자 대상조회 */ SELECT C.PRJ_CD as prjCd , C.WBS_CD as wbsCd , A.SA_SABUN_NEW as tmmrEmpNo , convert(varchar(10), DATEADD(DD,-1,GETDATE()) ,23) as patcEndDt FROM IRIS_SSO_USER A INNER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT B ON A.SA_DEPT_NEW = B.DEPT_CODE -- DEPT 뷰 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST C ON B.TEAM_DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CD AND (C.DEPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND C.DEPT_CD != '')-- 프로젝트마스터 WHERE A.SA_USER IS NOT NULL AND A.SA_USER != '' /* 유저ID없는 유저 제거 */ AND A.SSO_EX_FLAG = 'D' -- 퇴사자 ORDER BY C.PRJ_CD

/* retrievePrjTmmrMoveOutList 프로젝트 팀원 부서이동(이동 전) 대상조회 */ SELECT B.PRJ_CD as prjCd , B.WBS_CD as wbsCd , A.TMMR_EMP_NO as tmmrEmpNo , convert(varchar(10), GETDATE() ,23) as patcEndDt FROM IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO A -- 프로젝트참여연구원 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST B ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD WHERE (A.PATC_END_DT IS NULL OR A.PATC_END_DT = '') AND A.TMMR_EMP_NO NOT IN ( SELECT X.SA_SABUN_NEW FROM IRIS_SSO_USER X INNER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT Y ON X.SA_DEPT_NEW = Y.DEPT_CODE -- DEPT 뷰 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST Z ON Y.TEAM_DEPT_CODE = Z.DEPT_CD AND (Z.DEPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND Z.DEPT_CD != '')-- 프로젝트마스터 WHERE X.SA_USER IS NOT NULL AND X.SA_USER != '' /* 유저ID없는 유저 제거 */ AND X.SSO_EX_FLAG != 'D' AND Z.PRJ_CD = A.PRJ_CD ) and A.PRJ_CD <> 'PRJ00103' ORDER BY B.PRJ_CD

/* retrievePrjTmmrMoveInList 프로젝트 팀원 부서이동(이동 후) 대상조회 */ SELECT C.PRJ_CD as prjCd , C.WBS_CD as wbsCd , A.SA_SABUN_NEW as tmmrEmpNo , A.SA_NAME as saSabunName , A.SA_JOBX as saJobX , A.SA_JOBX_NAME as saJobXname FROM IRIS_SSO_USER A INNER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT B ON A.SA_DEPT_NEW = B.DEPT_CODE -- DEPT 뷰 INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST C ON B.TEAM_DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CD AND (C.DEPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND C.DEPT_CD != '')-- 프로젝트마스터 WHERE A.SA_USER IS NOT NULL AND A.SA_USER != '' /* 유저ID없는 유저 제거 */ AND A.SSO_EX_FLAG != 'D' AND A.SA_SABUN_NEW NOT IN ( SELECT X.TMMR_EMP_NO FROM IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO X -- 프로젝트참여연구원 WHERE X.PRJ_CD = C.PRJ_CD AND (X.PATC_END_DT IS NULL OR X.PATC_END_DT = '') ) ORDER BY C.PRJ_CD
